briefdescription.para: Computes values at the centers of gravity for a P1NC field.

para.verbatim: This method calculates the values of a P1NC field at the centers of gravity of the mesh elements. For each component of the field, it averages the values from the faces of each polygon.

parameterdescription.para: DoubleTab that will store the computed values. Must have 1 or 2 dimensions. If 1D, it will be resized to (dimension_tot(0), 1).

simplesect.para: Reference to the modified val DoubleTab containing computed values

parameterdescription.para: if val has more than 2 dimensions

simplesect.para: Implementation uses GPU parallelization through Kokkos
For each polygon, the value is computed as average of D+1 face values, where D is the spatial dimension

briefdescription.para: Projection du champ P1NC "cha" sur l'espace des champs P1.

detaileddescription.para: Le resultat est stocke dans cha.ch_som() et renvoye (valeur de retour) Voir note technique 2006/010 de Patrick Quemere "Nouvelle approche VEF pour la LES...". Voir aussi "What is in TRUST" : Scales_Separation_P1_P1NC.
